00085    void PairPotential::readPairListParam(std::istream& in)
00086    {
00087       read<double>(in, "skin", skin_);
00088       read<int>(in, "pairCapacity", pairCapacity_);
00089       read<Boundary>(in, "maxBoundary", maxBoundary_);
00090       cutoff_ = maxPairCutoff() + skin_;
00091 
00092       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00093          boundary() = maxBoundary_;
00094          //boundary().setOrthorhombic(maxBoundary_.lengths());
00095          // Above is necessary because the domain uses a reference to the
00096          // boundary to calculate domain bounds, if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL).
00097       }
00098 
00099       // Set cutoffs, and upper and lower bound of the processor domain.
00100       Vector lower;
00101       Vector upper;
00102       Vector cutoffs;
00103       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00104          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00105          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00106          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00107             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00108          } else {
00109             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/maxBoundary_.length(i);
00110          }
00111       }
00112 
00113       // Allocate CellList and PairList
00114       int localCapacity = storage().atomCapacity();
00115       int totalCapacity = localCapacity + storage().ghostCapacity();
00116       cellList_.allocate(totalCapacity, lower, upper, cutoffs);
00117       pairList_.allocate(localCapacity, pairCapacity_, cutoff_);
00118    }
00119 
00120    /*
00121    * Allocate memory for the cell list.
00122    */
00123    void PairPotential::initialize(const Boundary& maxBoundary, double skin, 
00124                                   int pairCapacity)
00125    {
00126       skin_ = skin;
00127       pairCapacity_ = pairCapacity;
00128       cutoff_ = maxPairCutoff() + skin;
00129       maxBoundary_ = maxBoundary;
00130 
00131       Vector cutoffs;
00132       Vector lower;
00133       Vector upper;
00134       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00135          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00136          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00137          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00138             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00139          } else {
00140             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/maxBoundary.length(i);
00141          }
00142       }
00143 
00144       int localCapacity = storage().atomCapacity();
00145       int totalCapacity = localCapacity + storage().ghostCapacity();
00146       cellList_.allocate(totalCapacity, lower, upper, cutoffs);
00147       pairList_.allocate(localCapacity, pairCapacity_, cutoff_);
00148    }

00150    /*
00151    * Build the cell list.
00152    */
00153    void PairPotential::buildCellList()
00154    {
00155       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00156          if (!storage().isCartesian()) {
00157             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates not Cartesian entering buildCellList");
00158          }
00159       } else {
00160          if (storage().isCartesian()) {
00161             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates are Cartesian entering buildCellList");
00162          }
00163       }
00164 
00165       // Set cutoff and domain bounds.
00166       Vector cutoffs;
00167       Vector lower;
00168       Vector upper;
00169       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00170          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00171             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00172          } else {
00173             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/boundaryPtr_->length(i);
00174          }
00175          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00176          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00177       }
00178       cellList_.makeGrid(lower, upper, cutoffs);
00179       cellList_.clear();
00180      
00181       // Add all atoms to the cell list. 
00182       AtomIterator atomIter;
00183       storage().begin(atomIter);
00184       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00185          cellList_.placeAtom(*atomIter);
00186       }
00187 
00188       // Add all ghosts to the cell list. 
00189       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00190       storage().begin(ghostIter);
00191       for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00192          cellList_.placeAtom(*ghostIter);
00193       }
00194 
00195       // Finalize cell list
00196       cellList_.build();
00197 
00198       // Postconditions
00199       assert(cellList_.isValid());
00200       assert(cellList_.nAtom() + cellList_.nReject() 
00201              == storage().nAtom() + storage().nGhost());
00202       if (storage().isCartesian()) {
00203          UTIL_THROW("Coordinates are Cartesian exiting buildCellList");
00204       }
00205 
00206    }
00207 
00208    /*
00209    * Build the pair list.
00210    */
00211    void PairPotential::buildPairList()
00212    {
00213       if (!storage().isCartesian()) {
00214          UTIL_THROW("Coordinates not Cartesian entering buildPairList");
00215       }
00216 
00217       pairList_.build(cellList_, reverseUpdateFlag());
00218    }

00221    /*
00222    * Build the cell list (i.e., fill with atoms).
00223    */
00224    void PairPotential::findNeighbors(const Vector& lower, const Vector& upper)
00225    {
00226  
00227       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00228          if (!storage().isCartesian()) {
00229             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates not Cartesian entering findNeighbors");
00230          }
00231       } else {
00232          if (storage().isCartesian()) {
00233             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates are Cartesian entering findNeighbors");
00234          }
00235       }
00236 
00237       Vector cutoffs;
00238       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00239          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00240             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00241          } else {
00242             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/boundaryPtr_->length(i);
00243          }
00244       }
00245       cellList_.makeGrid(lower, upper, cutoffs);
00246       cellList_.clear();
00247      
00248       // Add all atoms to the cell list. 
00249       AtomIterator atomIter;
00250       storage().begin(atomIter);
00251       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00252          cellList_.placeAtom(*atomIter);
00253       }
00254 
00255       // Add all ghosts to the cell list. 
00256       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00257       storage().begin(ghostIter);
00258       for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00259          cellList_.placeAtom(*ghostIter);
00260       }
00261 
00262       cellList_.build();
00263       assert(cellList_.isValid());
00264       assert(cellList_.nAtom() + cellList_.nReject() == storage().nAtom() + storage().nGhost());
00265 
00266       if (!UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00267          storage().transformGenToCart(*boundaryPtr_);
00268       }
00269       pairList_.build(cellList_, reverseUpdateFlag());
00270    }

00272    /*
00273    * Build the cell list (i.e., fill with atoms).
00274    */
00275    void PairPotential::findNeighbors()
00276    {
00277       // Make the cell list grid.
00278       Vector lower;
00279       Vector upper;
00280       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00281          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00282          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00283       }
00284       findNeighbors(lower, upper);
00285    }

00306    /*
00307    * Compute total pair nPair on all processors.
00308    */
00309    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00310    void PairPotential::computeNPair(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00311    #else
00312    void PairPotential::computeNPair()
00313    #endif
00314    { 
00315       double cut = maxPairCutoff();
00316       double cutSq = cut*cut;
00317       int localNPair = 0; 
00318       if (methodId() == 0) {
00319          localNPair = nPairList(cutSq); 
00320       } else 
00321       if (methodId() == 1) {
00322          localNPair = nPairCell(cutSq); 
00323       } else {
00324          localNPair = nPairNSq(cutSq); 
00325       }
00326       nPair_ = localNPair;
00327       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00328       communicator.Reduce(&localNPair, &nPair_, 1, MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, 0);
00329       #else
00330       nPair_ = localNPair;
00331       #endif
00332    }
00333 
00340    int PairPotential::nPair() const
00341    {  return nPair_; }
00342 
00343    /*
00344    * Count number pairs using pair list (private).
00345    */
00346    int PairPotential::nPairList(double cutoffSq)
00347    {
00348       Vector f;
00349       double rsq;
00350       PairIterator iter;
00351       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00352       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00353       int count = 0; // atom counter
00354       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00355          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00356             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00357             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00358             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00359             rsq = f.square();
00360             if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00361                count += 2;
00362             }
00363          }
00364       } else {
00365          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00366             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00367             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00368             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00369             rsq = f.square();
00370             if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00371                if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00372                   count += 2;
00373                } else {
00374                   count += 1;
00375                }
00376             }
00377          }
00378       }
00379       return count;
00380    }
00381 
00382    /*
00383    * Count number pairs using cell list (private).
00384    */
00385    int PairPotential::nPairCell(double cutoffSq)
00386    {
00387       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00388       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00389       Vector f;
00390       double rsq;
00391       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00392       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00393       const Cell*  cellPtr;
00394       int na, nn, i, j;
00395       int count = 0;
00396 
00397       // Iterate over linked list of local cells.
00398       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00399       while (cellPtr) {
00400          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors, reverseUpdateFlag());
00401          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00402          nn = neighbors.size();
00403          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00404             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00405 
00406             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00407             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00408                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00409                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00410                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00411                   rsq = f.square();
00412                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00413                      count += 2;
00414                   }
00415                }
00416             }
00417 
00418             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00419             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00420                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00421                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00422                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00423                   rsq = f.square();
00424                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00425                      count += 2;
00426                   }
00427                }
00428             } else {
00429                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00430                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00431                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00432                   rsq = f.square();
00433                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00434                      if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00435                         count += 2;
00436                      } else {
00437                         count += 1;
00438                      }
00439                   }
00440                }
00441             }
00442 
00443          }
00444          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00445       } // while (cellPtr) 
00446       return count;
00447    }
00448 
00449    /*
00450    * Count pairs using n-squared loop. (private)
00451    */
00452    int PairPotential::nPairNSq(double cutoffSq)
00453    {
00454       Vector f;
00455       double rsq;
00456       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00457       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00458       int id0, id1;
00459       int count = 0;
00460 
00461       // Iterate over local atom 0
00462       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00463       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00464          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00465 
00466          // Iterate over local atom 1
00467          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00468          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00469             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00470             if (id0 < id1) {
00471                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00472                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00473                   rsq = f.square();
00474                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00475                      count += 2;
00476                   }
00477                }
00478             }
00479          }
00480 
00481          // Iterate over ghost atoms
00482          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00483          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00484             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00485                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00486                if (id0 < id1) {
00487                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00488                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00489                      rsq = f.square();
00490                      if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00491                         count += 2;
00492                      }
00493                   }
00494                }
00495             }
00496          } else {
00497             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00498                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00499                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00500                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00501                   rsq = f.square();
00502                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00503                      count += 1;
00504                   }
00505                }
00506             }
00507          }
00508 
00509       }
00510       return count;
00511    }
